---
title: "CogE Data"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lattice)
```

```{r}
data <- read_excel("CogNOVRD.xlsx")
View(data)

```
```{r}

data1 <- subset(data, Over_4800=="N")
data1
aggregate(data1$Score, list(data1$Group), FUN=mean)
```


```{r}
vis <- ggplot(data, aes(x = Group, y = Score))+
  geom_boxplot()

vis

vis1 <- ggplot(data1, labels = c("c","con","rub"), aes(x = Group, y = Score, colour = Group))+
  geom_boxplot(aes(fill = Group))+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("mediumturquoise", "whitesmoke", "paleturquoise"), labels = c("c","con","rub"))+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("blue", "deeppink", "purple"), labels = c("c","con","rub"))+
  theme_dark()
 

vis1
```

```{r}
one.way <- aov(Score ~ Group, data = data)

summary(one.way)

one.way <- aov(Score ~ Group, data = data1)

summary(one.way)
```
